projects.name: Event Tracker
projects.description: This is a site that does some stuff
projects.learned: This was my first exposure to using an API or JSON, as well as using JQuery on the front-end to create a dynamic website.

projects.name: Mathio Party
projects.learned: This was a week-long group project that I put at least 80 hours into, so I learned a great deal about group version control and using an agile workflow. This was also my introduction to data collection and visualization.

projects.name: Rainy Day Science
projects.description: Award winning project at the 2016 San Francisco 'Science Hack Day'.
projects.learned: This was my first experiene working on a decoupled app, with a Rails backend and React front-end. I learned a good deal about manipulating the DOM in React using vanilla JavaScript and CSS, as opposed to using JQuery.
